text: Mokujin is a character made for the Tekken series. It first appeared in Tekken 3. == History == === Tekken 3 === Mokujin is a training dummy made from a 2000 year old oak tree. Mokujin had been kept in a museum for a long time, but when Ogre woke up, Mokujin started to move. In game lore, some people say that it wakes up every once in a while to help martial artists, but only God and Mokujin know. In the movie Shaolin Wooden Men (1976, featuringJackie Chan), Mokujin appears in the second part of the opening sequence, even though Tekken didn't come out until 1994. === Tekken 5/Tekken 5: Dark Resurrection === Mokujin was a wooden dummy made from white oak that was used to train martial artists. Mokujin started to move all of a sudden two years ago, but ceased moving after Ogre was defeated by Jin Kazama. When returned to the museum, Mokujin's face seemed to be smiling. Once again, Mokujin has started to move upon the emergence of a powerful entity... Will Mokujin ever be free? Category:Tekken characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1997
title: Mokujin
